content: molly s blankie a quick and easy blanket that kids love about the pattern this blankie is worked back and forth using one strand of yarn to create a waffle pattern with a garter knit border finished size approx 30 x 30 materials 645 yards of worsted weight yarn and us size 7 32 circular needles hint use sharp tips for easier picking up of yarn without splitting suggested yarn brown sheep cotton fleece - 80% cotton 20% merino 215 yards per 100 grams 3 skeins gauge 19 stitches x 20 row = 4 in waffle pattern before blocking gauge is not critical but aiming for a slightly loose knitted fabric gives this blanket a wonderful drape that kids love instructions cast on 127 stitches knit 10 row garter stitch knit in pattern until blanket measures approx 29 from cast-on edge row 1 3 5 & 6 knit row 2 & 4 k6 p3 *k1 p3 repeat from * to end of row k6 repeat these 6 row for pattern ending with row 6 knit 10 more row in garter stitch bind off and weave in ends free pattern published in jenniferknitifer s ravelry store
